query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.dim_id:dim_id@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.level_name:level_name@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.level_id:level_id@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.start_date:start_date@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.finish_date:finish_date@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.wbs_sequence:wbs_sequence@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.project:project@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.release:release@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.agl_state:agile_state@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.agl_pln_start:pln_start@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.agl_pln_finish:pln_finish@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.agl_act_start:act_start@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.agl_act_finish:act_finish@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.investment_int_id:investment_int_id@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.task_int_id:task_int_id@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.linkcode:linkcode@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:@UPPER@(a.odf_object_code):investment_type_upper@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:PROJECT:a.hg_has_children:hg_has_children@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:a.agl_prelim_est:prelim_est@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:@NVL@(a.agl_est_stypts,0):est_stypts@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:@NVL@(a.agl_est_usrsty,0):est_usrsty@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:@NVL@(a.agl_acp_stypts,0):acp_stypts@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:@NVL@(a.agl_acp_usrsty,0):acp_usrsty@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:@NVL@(a.agl_pctdon_stc,0):pctdon_stc@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:@NVL@(a.agl_pctdon_plest,0):pctdon_plest@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:a.agl_risk_score:risk_score@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:a.agl_value_score:value_score@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:a.agl_wsjf_score:wsjf_score@ FROM ( -- Product Level SELECT DISTINCT 'L1-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(i.id) dim_id, i.name level_name, i.code level_id, i.schedule_start start_date, @DBUSER@.COP_CALC_FINISH_TIME_FCT(i.schedule_finish) finish_date, 0 wbs_sequence, i.id investment_int_id, NULL task_int_id, NULL project, NULL release, NULL agl_state, s.agl_pln_start agl_pln_start, s.agl_pln_finish agl_pln_finish, s.agl_act_start agl_act_start, s.agl_act_finish agl_act_finish, NULL agl_prelim_est, @NVL@(s.agl_acp_stypts,0) agl_acp_stypts, @NVL@(s.agl_acp_usrsty,0) agl_acp_usrsty, @NVL@(s.agl_est_stypts,0) agl_est_stypts, @NVL@(s.agl_est_usrsty,0) agl_est_usrsty, CASE WHEN @NVL@(s.agl_est_usrsty,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (@NVL@(s.agl_acp_usrsty,0) / @NVL@(s.agl_est_usrsty,0) * 100) END agl_pctdon_stc, CASE WHEN @NVL@(s.agl_est_stypts,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (@NVL@(s.agl_acp_stypts,0) / @NVL@(s.agl_est_stypts,0) * 100) END agl_pctdon_plest, NULL agl_risk_score, NULL agl_value_score, NULL agl_wsjf_score, 'investmentProperties' linkcode, i.odf_object_code odf_object_code, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h INNER JOIN inv_investments inv ON h.child_id = inv.id WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND h.parent_id = i.id AND inv.odf_object_code = 'product') > 0 THEN 'L1-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(i.id) WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h INNER JOIN inv_projects p ON h.child_id = p.prid WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND h.parent_id = i.id AND p.is_program = 1) > 0 THEN 'L1-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(i.id) WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND h.parent_id = i.id AND h.child_id IN (SELECT f.child_id FROM inv_flat_hierarchies f INNER JOIN odf_ca_project p ON f.child_id = p.id WHERE f.parent_id <> f.child_id AND p.agl_id IS NULL AND h.parent_id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:product@)) > 0 THEN 'L2-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(i.id) ELSE (SELECT DISTINCT 'L2-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(i.id) FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND h.parent_id = i.id AND h.child_id IN (SELECT f.child_id FROM inv_flat_hierarchies f INNER JOIN odf_ca_project p ON f.child_id = p.id WHERE f.parent_id <> f.child_id AND p.agl_id IS NOT NULL AND h.parent_id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:product@)) END hg_has_children FROM inv_investments i INNER JOIN inv_flat_hierarchies h ON i.id = h.parent_id LEFT OUTER JOIN agl_hierarchy_rollup_mlst_v s ON s.investment_id = i.id WHERE i.is_active = 1 AND i.odf_object_code = 'product' AND i.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:product@ AND @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:hg_row_id@ IS NULL AND @WHERE:SECURITY:INV:i.id@ UNION ALL -- Sub-product/Program Level SELECT 'L2-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(i.id) dim_id, i.name level_name, i.code level_id, i.schedule_start start_date, @DBUSER@.COP_CALC_FINISH_TIME_FCT(i.schedule_finish) finish_date, 99999 wbs_sequence, i.id investment_int_id, NULL task_int_id, NULL project, NULL release, p.agl_state, s.agl_pln_start agl_pln_start, s.agl_pln_finish agl_pln_finish, s.agl_act_start agl_act_start, s.agl_act_finish agl_act_finish, NULL agl_prelim_est, @NVL@(s.agl_acp_stypts,0) agl_acp_stypts, @NVL@(s.agl_acp_usrsty,0) agl_acp_usrsty, @NVL@(s.agl_est_stypts,0) agl_est_stypts, @NVL@(s.agl_est_usrsty,0) agl_est_usrsty, CASE WHEN @NVL@(s.agl_est_usrsty,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (@NVL@(s.agl_acp_usrsty,0) / @NVL@(s.agl_est_usrsty,0) * 100) END agl_pctdon_stc, CASE WHEN @NVL@(s.agl_est_stypts,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (@NVL@(s.agl_acp_stypts,0) / @NVL@(s.agl_est_stypts,0) * 100) END agl_pctdon_plest, p.agl_risk_score, p.agl_value_score, p.agl_wsjf_score, CASE WHEN @UPPER@(i.odf_object_code) = 'PROJECT' THEN 'projectProperties' ELSE 'investmentProperties' END linkcode, i.odf_object_code odf_object_code, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h INNER JOIN inv_investments inv ON h.child_id = inv.id WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND h.parent_id = i.id AND inv.odf_object_code = 'product') > 0 THEN 'L1-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(i.id) WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h INNER JOIN inv_projects p ON h.child_id = p.prid WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND h.parent_id = i.id AND p.is_program = 1) > 0 THEN 'L1-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(i.id) WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h INNER JOIN odf_ca_project p ON h.child_id = p.id WHERE h.parent_id = i.id AND h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND p.agl_id IS NOT NULL) > 0 THEN 'L2-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(i.id) ELSE NULL END hg_has_children FROM inv_investments i INNER JOIN inv_hierarchies h ON h.child_id = i.id LEFT OUTER JOIN odf_ca_project p ON p.id = i.id LEFT OUTER JOIN agl_hierarchy_rollup_mlst_v s ON s.investment_id = i.id WHERE i.is_active = 1 AND ((i.odf_object_code = 'project' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h INNER JOIN odf_ca_project p ON h.child_id = p.id WHERE h.parent_id = i.id AND p.agl_id IS NOT NULL) > 0 AND i.id IN (SELECT p.prid p FROM inv_projects p WHERE p.is_program = 1)) OR i.odf_object_code = 'product') AND (('L1-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(h.parent_id) = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:hg_row_id@) OR ('L2-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(h.parent_id) = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:hg_row_id@)) AND @WHERE:SECURITY:INV:i.id@ UNION ALL -- Milestone SELECT 'L3-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(m.milestone_id) dim_id, m.milestone_name level_name, m.milestone_code level_id, NULL start_date, NULL finish_date, 99999 wbs_sequence, NULL investment_int_id, NULL task_int_id, NULL project, NULL release, NULL agl_state, s.agl_pln_start agl_pln_start, s.agl_pln_finish agl_pln_finish, s.agl_act_start agl_act_start, s.agl_act_finish agl_act_finish, NULL agl_prelim_est, @NVL@(s.agl_acp_stypts,0) agl_acp_stypts, @NVL@(s.agl_acp_usrsty,0) agl_acp_usrsty, @NVL@(s.agl_est_stypts,0) agl_est_stypts, @NVL@(s.agl_est_usrsty,0) agl_est_usrsty, @NVL@(s.agl_pctdon_stc,0) agl_pctdon_stc, @NVL@(s.agl_pctdon_plest,0) agl_pctdon_plest, NULL agl_risk_score, NULL agl_value_score, NULL agl_wsjf_score, NULL linkcode, NULL odf_object_code, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM odf_multi_valued_lookups m INNER JOIN prtask t ON t.prid = m.pk_id INNER JOIN odf_ca_task odf_t ON odf_t.id = t.prid INNER JOIN odf_ca_project p ON t.prprojectid = p.id WHERE m.value = mvl.milestone AND p.agl_id IS NOT NULL AND odf_t.agl_tsk_id IS NOT NULL AND odf_t.agl_tsk_story_id IS NULL AND m.attribute = 'agl_tsk_milestones' AND t.prprojectid IN (SELECT h.child_id FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND h.parent_id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:product@)) > 0 THEN 'L4-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(mvl.milestone) ELSE NULL END hg_has_children FROM (SELECT DISTINCT mvl.value milestone FROM odf_multi_valued_lookups mvl INNER JOIN prtask t ON t.prid = mvl.pk_id INNER JOIN inv_hierarchies h ON h.child_id = t.prprojectid WHERE mvl.attribute = 'agl_tsk_milestones' AND (h.child_id IN (SELECT h.child_id FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND 'L2-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(h.parent_id) = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:hg_row_id@) ) ) mvl INNER JOIN int_agl_milestones m ON m.milestone_id = mvl.milestone LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT mvl.value milestone, MIN(odf_t.agl_tsk_pln_start) agl_pln_start, MAX(odf_t.agl_tsk_pln_finish) agl_pln_finish, MIN(odf_t.agl_tsk_act_start) agl_act_start, MAX(odf_t.agl_tsk_act_finish) agl_act_finish, SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_acp_stypts,0)) agl_acp_stypts, SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_acp_usrsty,0)) agl_acp_usrsty, SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_est_stypts,0)) agl_est_stypts, SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_est_usrsty,0)) agl_est_usrsty, CASE WHEN SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_est_usrsty,0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_acp_usrsty,0)) / SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_est_usrsty,0)) * 100) END agl_pctdon_stc, CASE WHEN SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_est_stypts,0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_acp_stypts,0)) / SUM(@NVL@(odf_t.agl_tsk_est_stypts,0)) * 100) END agl_pctdon_plest FROM odf_multi_valued_lookups mvl INNER JOIN odf_ca_task odf_t ON odf_t.id = mvl.pk_id INNER JOIN prtask tasks ON tasks.prid = odf_t.id WHERE mvl.attribute = 'agl_tsk_milestones' AND tasks.prprojectid IN (SELECT h.child_id FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND h.parent_id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:product@) GROUP BY mvl.value) s ON s.milestone = mvl.milestone WHERE 1=1 UNION ALL -- WBS Level SELECT 'L4-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(tasks.prprojectid) @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(tasks.prid) dim_id, tasks.prname level_name, tasks.prexternalid level_id, tasks.prstart start_date, @DBUSER@.COP_CALC_FINISH_TIME_FCT(tasks.prfinish) finish_date, tasks.prwbssequence wbs_sequence, i.id investment_int_id, tasks.prid task_int_id, i.name project, odf_t.agl_tsk_release release, odf_t.agl_tsk_state agl_state, odf_t.agl_tsk_pln_start agl_pln_start, odf_t.agl_tsk_pln_finish agl_pln_finish, odf_t.agl_tsk_act_start agl_act_start, odf_t.agl_tsk_act_finish agl_act_finish, odf_t.agl_tsk_prelim_est agl_prelim_est, odf_t.agl_tsk_acp_stypts agl_acp_stypts, odf_t.agl_tsk_acp_usrsty agl_acp_usrsty, odf_t.agl_tsk_est_stypts agl_est_stypts, odf_t.agl_tsk_est_usrsty agl_est_usrsty, odf_t.agl_tsk_pctdon_stc * 100 agl_pctdon_stc, odf_t.agl_tsk_pctdon_plest * 100 agl_pctdon_plest, odf_t.agl_tsk_risk_score agl_risk_score, odf_t.agl_tsk_value_score agl_value_score, odf_t.agl_tsk_wsjf_score agl_wsjf_score, 'taskProperties' linkcode, i.odf_object_code odf_object_code, NULL hg_has_children FROM prtask tasks INNER JOIN inv_investments i ON i.id = tasks.prprojectid INNER JOIN odf_project_v2 pv ON pv.odf_pk = i.id INNER JOIN odf_ca_task odf_t ON odf_t.id = tasks.prid INNER JOIN odf_multi_valued_lookups mvl ON tasks.prid = mvl.pk_id WHERE pv.is_program = 0 AND mvl.attribute = 'agl_tsk_milestones' AND odf_t.agl_tsk_id IS NOT NULL AND odf_t.agl_tsk_story_id IS NULL AND ('L4-' @+@ @DBUSER@.AGL_TO_CHAR_FCT(mvl.value) = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:hg_row_id@) AND tasks.prprojectid IN (SELECT h.child_id FROM inv_flat_hierarchies h WHERE h.parent_id <> h.child_id AND h.parent_id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:product@) ) A WHERE 1=1 AND @FILTER@
